selected_quotes: Others believe viruses evolved from cellular organisms and so count as a fourth domain of life.
Much like what some people are now But not as arrogant as them
It is no wonder that most zombie stories involve a virus.
Are viruses alive or more like zombies?
Maybe it would be just easier to consider viruses undead.

citation.abstract: The latest research dismisses the idea that viruses form a fourth type of life.
